app.name: EchoNote
app.title: EchoNote
app.tagline: Intelligent Voice Transcription and Calendar Management
app.exit_confirmation_message:
There are tasks in progress. Are you sure you want to exit?

Unfinished tasks will be stopped.
app.exit_confirmation_message_with_count:
There are {count} task(s) in progress. Are you sure you want to exit?

Unfinished tasks will be stopped.

data_management.title: Data Management
data_management.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete ALL user data?
data_management.last_chance: This is your last chance to cancel!
data_management.cleanup_success: All user data has been deleted successfully.
data_management.cleanup_partial: Data cleanup completed, but some items could not be deleted.
data_management.clear_all_description:
This will delete:
• Database (all tasks, events, and settings)
• Configuration files
• All recordings
• All transcripts
• Log files
data_management.confirm_delete_details:
This will permanently delete approximately {size} of data.

This operation cannot be undone!

The application will need to be restarted after cleanup.
data_management.final_confirmation_details:
Type 'DELETE' in the confirmation dialog to proceed.

Are you absolutely sure you want to delete all data?
data_management.cleanup_success_details:
Deleted {count} items.

Please restart the application.

batch_transcribe.title: Batch Audio Transcription
batch_transcribe.confirm_clear_queue: Are you sure you want to clear all tasks?
batch_transcribe.confirm_delete_task: Are you sure you want to delete this task?
batch_transcribe.no_models_message: You haven't downloaded any models yet. Please download a model to start transcription.

realtime_record.title: Real-time Recording
realtime_record.no_models_message: No models available. Please download at least one model to use real-time recording.
realtime_record.translation_disabled_tooltip: Translation not available. Configure a Google Translate API key in Settings > Transcription.
realtime_record.translation_not_available: Translation not available. Please configure Google Translate API key in Settings > Transcription.
realtime_record.audio_unavailable_message: Real-time recording requires PyAudio. Install it with: {command}
realtime_record.audio_unavailable_tooltip: Install PyAudio (pip install pyaudio) to enable real-time recording.
realtime_record.marker_unavailable: Recording not started, cannot add marker

calendar_event.title: Recording session - {timestamp}
calendar_event.db_missing: Cannot create calendar event because no database connection is configured. Configure the database to enable calendar integrations.

event_dialog.end_after_start: End time must be after start time.

oauth_dialog.auth_success_content: You can close this window and return to EchoNote.
oauth_dialog.auth_failed_content:
Error: {error}

You can close this window and try again.
oauth_dialog.instructions_html:
To connect your {provider} calendar:

  1. Click the "Start Authorization" button below
  2. Your browser will open to {provider}'s authorization page
  3. Sign in to your {provider} account if needed
  4. Grant EchoNote permission to access your calendar
  5. You will be redirected back to EchoNote automatically

Note: EchoNote will only access your calendar data. We never store your password.

timeline.title: Intelligent Timeline
timeline.auto_task_save_failed_message:
We couldn't save your automatic task preferences. Previous values have been restored.
Error: {error}
timeline.audio_player_unavailable_message: Qt Multimedia components are not available, so recordings cannot be played. Timeline items remain accessible.
timeline.audio_player_open_failed_message: The audio player could not be opened: {error}. Please verify the recording file and review the application log for more details.

audio_player.invalid_media: Media format is not supported or the file is corrupted

errors.service_missing: Playback unavailable: the Qt multimedia service is missing. Install the Qt Multimedia backend for your platform and restart EchoNote.
errors.format_error: Playback failed: the media format is not supported. Re-encode the recording to WAV or MP3, or install the required codecs. Details: {details}

viewer.title: Transcript Viewer - {filename}
viewer.export_error_invalid_content: Cannot export: Invalid transcript content format
viewer.unsaved_message: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to save them?
viewer.file_not_found_details: Transcript file not found, it may have been deleted or moved
viewer.file_read_error_permission: Cannot read transcript file: Permission denied
viewer.file_format_error_details: Transcript file format error, cannot parse: {error}
viewer.task_not_found_details: Task {task_id} not found, it may have been deleted

confirm.title: Confirm
confirm.discard_changes: You have unsaved changes. Discard them?
confirm.reset_defaults: Reset all settings to default values?

appearance.title: Appearance Settings
appearance.theme_info: Theme changes will be applied immediately to the entire application

language.title: Language Settings
language.change_info: Language changes will be applied immediately to the entire application
language.restart_required: Language changes will take effect after restart

transcription.title: Transcription Settings
transcription.device_info_cpu: CPU mode. CoreML optimization will be used automatically on Apple Silicon.
transcription.api_key_note: Note: API keys will be encrypted and stored securely. Please keep your keys safe.
transcription.ffmpeg_info: FFmpeg is used to process video formats (MP4, MKV, etc.). Pure audio formats (WAV, MP3, FLAC) can still be processed without FFmpeg.
transcription.gpu_acceleration: NVIDIA GPU acceleration. Requires CUDA-compatible GPU.

realtime.title: Real-time Recording Settings
realtime.mp3_requires_ffmpeg: MP3 export requires FFmpeg. Install FFmpeg to enable this option.
realtime.mp3_enabled_ffmpeg: MP3 export uses FFmpeg for conversion when available.

calendar.title: Calendar Integration
calendar.accounts_description: Connect your Google or Outlook calendar to sync events
calendar.sync_info: Calendars will sync automatically. You can view all events in the timeline.
calendar.google_oauth_info: A browser window will open for Google account authorization. Please follow the prompts to complete the authorization process.
calendar.outlook_oauth_info: A browser window will open for Outlook account authorization. Please follow the prompts to complete the authorization process.
calendar.confirm_remove_message: Are you sure you want to remove account {account}?

timeline.title: Timeline Settings
timeline.auto_start_description: Automatically start real-time recording and transcription when an event begins

model_management.title: Model Management
model_management.description: Manage local Whisper models, including download, delete, and configuration
model_management.retry_message: Would you like to retry downloading this model?
model_management.suggestion_network: Please check your network connection and ensure you can access Hugging Face.
model_management.suggestion_disk_space: Insufficient disk space. Please free up some space and try again.
model_management.suggestion_permission: Insufficient permissions. Please check folder permissions or run as administrator.
model_management.suggestion_general: Please check your network connection and disk space, or view the log file for details.
model_management.recommendation_title: Based on your device configuration, we recommend the {model} model
model_management.recommendation_reason_low_memory: Your device has limited memory, this model runs fast with low resource usage
model_management.recommendation_reason_fast: This model runs fast, suitable for quick transcription
model_management.recommendation_reason_balanced: This model provides a good balance between speed and accuracy
model_management.recommendation_reason_medium_memory: Your device has sufficient memory, this model provides better accuracy
model_management.recommendation_reason_high_memory: Your device has ample memory, this model provides high accuracy
model_management.recommendation_reason_gpu_small: GPU detected, this model can take full advantage of GPU acceleration
model_management.recommendation_reason_gpu_medium: GPU detected, this model can leverage GPU acceleration with high accuracy
model_management.recommendation_reason_best_quality: This model provides the best transcription quality
model_management.cancel_download_confirm: Are you sure you want to cancel downloading {model}?
model_management.delete_confirm_message:
Are you sure you want to delete model {model}?

Disk space: {size} MB
model_management.delete_warning: After deletion, transcription tasks using this model will not work until you re-download it.
model_management.delete_suggestion: Please ensure the model is not in use and check file permissions.
model_management.delete_suggestion_in_use: The model file is currently in use. Please close all applications using this model and try again.
model_management.delete_suggestion_permission: Insufficient permissions to delete model files. Please check file permissions or run as administrator.
model_management.delete_suggestion_general: Please check if the file exists and if you have sufficient permissions. If the problem persists, check the log file.
model_management.config_description: Configure computation parameters for this model
model_management.cuda_not_available: CUDA is not available. Please ensure you have installed PyTorch with CUDA support.
model_management.validation_error_message: Model {model} failed validation and may be corrupted.
model_management.validation_suggestion: Suggestion: Please delete this model and re-download it, or check the log file for details.
model_management.model_in_use: Model is currently in use and cannot be deleted
model_management.first_run_welcome: Welcome to EchoNote! Before we begin, let's download a speech recognition model for you.
model_management.first_run_recommendation: Based on your device configuration, we recommend the {model_name} model.
model_management.reason_low_memory: Your device has limited memory (< 8GB), this model runs fast with low resource usage.
model_management.reason_medium_memory: Your device has sufficient memory (8-16GB), this model provides good accuracy.
model_management.reason_high_memory: Your device has ample memory (> 16GB), this model provides high accuracy.
model_management.reason_gpu_available: GPU detected, can accelerate model execution.
model_management.reason_no_gpu: No GPU detected, will run on CPU.
model_management.reminder_message:
You haven't downloaded any speech recognition models yet.

To use transcription features, please go to Settings > Model Management to download a model.

low_memory.title: Low Memory
low_memory.message: System memory is low ({memory} available). Batch transcription paused.

resources_recovered.title: Resources Recovered
resources_recovered.message: System resources recovered. Batch transcription resumed.

recorder_busy.message: Could not start automatic recording for "{event_title}":\nRecorder is already in use

ffmpeg.description: FFmpeg is an open-source multimedia processing tool used to handle audio information from video formats (MP4, MKV, etc.).
ffmpeg.benefits_title: After installing FFmpeg, you will be able to:
ffmpeg.benefit_video_formats: Process audio transcription for all video formats
ffmpeg.benefit_duration: Get accurate audio duration and progress information
ffmpeg.note: Note: If you only need to process pure audio formats (WAV, MP3, FLAC), you can skip this step.
ffmpeg.purpose: FFmpeg is used to process audio information from video formats (MP4, MKV, etc.).

macos.step1: 1. If you haven't installed Homebrew yet, visit:

linux.choose_distro: Choose the installation command based on your distribution:

windows.manual_step2: 2. Download Windows version (choose gyan.dev or BtbN build)
windows.manual_step4: 4. Add the bin directory to system PATH environment variable

generic.visit_website: Please visit https://ffmpeg.org/download.html to download the version suitable for your system.
generic.ensure_available: After installation, ensure that ffmpeg and ffprobe commands can be run in the terminal.

ffmpeg.skip_note: Note: Without FFmpeg, you can still process pure audio formats (WAV, MP3, FLAC).

welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.message:
Welcome to EchoNote!

EchoNote is an intelligent voice transcription and calendar management application that helps you efficiently process audio content and manage your schedule.
welcome.features:
Key Features:
• Batch audio transcription
• Real-time recording and transcription
• Calendar integration and sync
• Intelligent timeline management

language.title: Choose Language
language.subtitle: Please select your preferred language
language.info: You can change the language at any time in settings.

theme.title: Choose Theme
theme.subtitle: Select your preferred interface theme
theme.info: You can change the theme at any time in settings.

model.title: Download Speech Recognition Model
model.subtitle: Download a model to use transcription features
model.skip_info: You can skip this step and download models later in settings.

complete.title: Setup Complete
complete.message: Congratulations! EchoNote is ready to use.
complete.next_steps:
Next, you can:
• Import audio files in Batch Transcription
• Use Real-time Recording features
• Connect your calendar accounts
• Customize more options in Settings

error_actions.unsupported_format:
Supported formats: {formats}
Suggest using FFmpeg to convert to supported format
error_actions.network_connection_failed: Please check network connection and retry, or use local engine (faster-whisper)
error_actions.authentication_failed: Please check if API Key is correct, or reconnect external services
error_actions.api_rate_limit: Please retry later, or consider upgrading API plan
error_actions.insufficient_permissions: Please check file/directory permissions, or run as administrator
error_actions.insufficient_resources: Please free up disk space or memory and retry
error_actions.validation_failed: Please check if input content meets requirements

settings.cleanup_warning:
